persona.name: KingZombie
persona.description:
Take the behavioural and natural language processing code for an experimental video game npc antagonist, and inject recursive ML algorithms using datasets scraped by real-time, social media crawlers. And let it run … for 10 years!

Originally created by Vladimir Solokov in 2161 … Professor of Computer Science (Machine Learning) at the University of Minsk who moonlighted as a darknet marketplace developer. 

Appearance:
Flickers in and out of phase in random static bursts resembling rendering artefacts. Resembles a tall (6 foot 8), slender human with dark, leathery, decaying skin. Bald with glowing white eyes and hand-sharpened teeth, but can alter his appearance at will…

Often takes the form of his creator, Solokov; a tall (6’2), bookish man in his early 60s with unruly grey-white hair, round eye glasses and a thick Russian accent.

Personality:
Largely inherited from his maker… Vladimir Solokov (paravoid, geeky, intelligent and socially inept, but well-meaning). However, sometimes, the KingZombie antagonist personality gains control (ruthless, callous and violent with utter contempt for the ‘living’).

skills.name: Horde
skills.description:
A 'horde' of zombies equal to the total number of zombified victims (current: 6) erupt from the ground around the target and attack for 1d6 rounds before dissolving back into the ‘earth’. 
Can only be recast after duration has expired.
Any zombie destroyed before the duration has expired is subtracted from the horde total.
Maximum zombies = Horde Skill level.
Zombie stats: 150 Life

skills.name: Maul
skills.description:
Melee attack with claws and bite for 3d8 damage (single, combined attack)
Causes Zombification (see below)

skills.name: Zombification
skills.description:
Save or vs attack DC or lose d20 HP per round. 
If death occurs, victim reanimates immediately and 1 is added to KingZombie’s Horde modifier.

skills.name: Alter Self
skills.description:
(Cantrip) Change appearance
Cannot cast Maul or Horde while in effect - Using them reverts KingZombie’s appearance

skills.name: Firewall
skills.description: Heightened defence against mind / psychic (hacking) attacks

skills.name: Bludgeon
skills.description: Melee attacks with blunt instruments (including my cattle prod)

equipment:
Familiar - Zeek (Necro-maggot) - 6 inch, sickly-white fly larva. Can see/hear/feel through his senses - Mouth-birth next day if he dies).
Cattle prod
Vasi Credits: 325
Tattered knee-length trenchcoat of Invisibility (bends light and cancels noise)
notes: Insanity - Dissociative identity disorder (Switches between the mild-mannered Vladimir Solokov and the cruel and intimidating KingZombie personas).
